item.title: Reminder: Meet & Greet, tonight, 7PM at Lucky Lab Brew Pub
item.dc:creator: Thomas Lockney
item.content:encoded:
Just a quick reminder that the PDXScala meet & greet is tonight at the Lucky Lab Brew Pub on Hawthorne, starting at 7PM. I hope to see you all there.

More details are available in the previous post.
item.excerpt:encoded: Just a quick reminder that the PDXScala meet & greet is tonight at the Lucky Lab Brew Pub on Hawthorne, starting at 7PM. I hope to see you all there. More details are available in the previous post.
